gw.document

Interface DocumentApplicationContext


  • public interface DocumentApplicationContext
    Interface for app-independent PCFs to create/manipulate app-specific DocumentCreationInfo and DocumentDetailsApplicationHelper objects

    Should be implemented at the application level

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DocumentApplicationContext.DocumentCreationResetState
      Block for resetting UI specific state during document creation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo()
      Constructs an app-specific DocumentCreationInfo for the creation of Documents
      DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplateDescriptor)
      Constructs an app-specific DocumentCreationInfo for creation of Documents
      DocumentDetailsApplicationHelper createDocumentDetailsHelper(Document[] documents)
      Constructs an app-specific helper object for treating an array of Documents as a single object in PCFs
      void generateDocument(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo)
      Invoked by the "Create Document" button on a New Document worksheet when no client-side rendering of the generated document is required.
      boolean getDocumentCreationReadOnly()
      Determines if the Document Creation UI is in a state where the document can be generated
      DocumentApplicationContext.DocumentCreationResetState getDocumentCreationResetState()
      Gets the block for resetting document creation UI state
      boolean isTemplateResetSinceSetLastChecked()
      Checks to see if the template descriptor has been reset since last invoked
      void resetTemplateBasedInfo(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor newTemplate)
      Resets template descriptor state from a (new) DocumentCreationInfo
      void setDocumentCreationReadOnly(boolean documentCreationReadOnly)
      Sets the Document Creation UI state specifying whether the document can be generated
      void setDocumentCreationResetState(DocumentApplicationContext.DocumentCreationResetState documentCreationResetState)
      Sets the block for resetting document creation UI state

        DocumentCreationInfo createDocumentCreationInfo(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplateDescriptor)
        Constructs an app-specific DocumentCreationInfo for creation of Documents
        Parameters:
        documentTemplateDescriptor - IDocumentTemplateDescriptor
        Returns:
        DocumentCreationInfo

      • generateDocument

        void generateDocument(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo)
        Invoked by the "Create Document" button on a New Document worksheet when no client-side rendering of the generated document is required. This will invoke the document production plugin, then set up the fields on current creation info so that it shows up on the client
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - DocumentCreationInfo

      • resetTemplateBasedInfo

        void resetTemplateBasedInfo(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo,
                            IDocumentTemplateDescriptor newTemplate)
        Resets template descriptor state from a (new) DocumentCreationInfo
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - DocumentCreationInfo for setting template descriptor
        newTemplate - IDocumentTemplateDescriptor the new template descriptor

      • isTemplateResetSinceSetLastChecked

        boolean isTemplateResetSinceSetLastChecked()
        Checks to see if the template descriptor has been reset since last invoked
        Returns:
        boolean true if template reset since last invocation

      • getDocumentCreationReadOnly

        boolean getDocumentCreationReadOnly()
        Determines if the Document Creation UI is in a state where the document can be generated
        Returns:
        true if the document can be generated, false otherwise
        See Also:
        setDocumentCreationReadOnly(boolean)

      • setDocumentCreationReadOnly

        void setDocumentCreationReadOnly(boolean documentCreationReadOnly)
        Sets the Document Creation UI state specifying whether the document can be generated
        Parameters:
        documentCreationReadOnly - true if the document can be generated, false otherwise
        See Also:
        getDocumentCreationReadOnly()

      • getDocumentCreationResetState

        Gets the block for resetting document creation UI state

        the block
        See Also:

        Sets the block for resetting document creation UI state
        Parameters:
        documentCreationResetState - the block
        See Also:
        getDocumentCreationResetState()
